## Pre-Processing of Airport Coordinate Data

```{r}
airports <- read.csv("~/flight-delays/airports.csv")

library(tidyverse)

airports %>%
  mutate(Location = paste0(airports$AIRPORT, " (", airports$IATA, " )"))
```

## Setting up map with 1 flight path

```{r}
library(leaflet)
library(geosphere)
gcIntermediate(c(x,y), c(a,b),      ## (x,y) - coordinates of origin, (a,b) - coordinates of destination
              n=100,                
              addStartEnd = TRUE,
              sp=TRUE) %>%
    leaflet() %>%
    addTiles() %>%
    addPolylines(CITY, AIRPORT, STATE)
```
